csw:Record.dct:abstract:
'''Short description:''' For the Arctic Ocean - multiple Sentinel-1 scenes, Sigma0 calibrated and noise-corrected, with individual geographical map projections over Svalbard and Greenland Sea regions.
'''DOI (product) :''' https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00124
